meanings.definition: Feeling or showing great pleasure or satisfaction.
meanings.sent1: The children were delighted with their new toys.
meanings.sent2: She was delighted to receive a surprise gift.
meanings.sent3: The puppy looked delighted when it saw its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a delighted burst of colors in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The delicious smell of freshly baked cookies left everyone delighted.

meanings.sent1: He was delighted to hear the good news.

meanings.sent3: The cat looked delighted after catching a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The delighted laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The delighted smile on her face showed her happiness.
